metadata.title: CVE-2022-4382 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw caused by a race among the superblock operations inthe gadgetfs Linux driver was found. It could be triggered by yanking out adevice that is running the gadgetfs side.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
